alert.note: Alert for McLean; Webster (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 13 at 9:47PM EST until January 15 at 12:08AM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Kentucky... Green River at Calhoun and Paradise. .Water levels are falling along the Green River at Paradise and Calhoun. Minor flooding is now occurring at both locations. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH FRIDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Green River at Calhoun. * WHEN...Until late tomorrow evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CST Thursday the stage was 24.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage tomorrow afternoon and continue falling to 16.5 feet Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 23.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
